name: Sickness (itch) (Echosai, MiladKhanoie, Josh Greathead)
description:
You have been put into quarantine. You haven't left your room in months. You haven't seen anyone in months.
Interact with the things in your room to try and piece together the puzzle. 
There are 4 available endings.

Controls: 
Left click to interact with objects.
Space bar to interact with the dialogue box.

Credits: 
Bonita Woralert - Producer, Programmer, Art
Milad Khanoie - Art
Josh Greathead - Art

Art folder:
Within this .zip file there is a folder of art that we made for the game. We recommend not to look before completing it.
The art that we created can be easily missed depending on the route that the player takes, which is why we have included it here.

Thank you for playing our game! 
Mmm, Jam. 

Edit: There is a second download link - the game window was broken for some people with monitors that weren't 1080p or if they had their system settings zoomed in :) Note: This version does not contain the extra text files or art folder.
